entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 11:54 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.2°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
